title: The Chedi Andermatt partners with The Lucerne Festival in Switzerland to present a 'Spectacle of Sound' at 1,500 metres high
text:
Switzerland The Chedi Andermatt partners with The Lucerne Festival in Switzerland to present a 'Spectacle of Sound' at 1,500 metres high The Chedi Andermatt partners with The Lucerne Festival in Switzerland to present a 'Spectacle of Sound' at 1,500 metres high Details Category: Switzerland   16:00 The Chedi Andermatt has announced its partnership with the Lucerne Festival in Switzerland; a highly regarded, international music festival for classical music. Host to outstanding musicians and performances, the prestigious Lucerne Festival has enchanted music lovers from all over the world every August and September for over 75 years. 
This October, the spirit of the Festival defies the city walls as guests of The Chedi Andermatt are invited to experience a taste of the masterful sound spectacle in Andermatt. In collaboration with the festival organisers, guests of The Chedi Andermatt have the unique opportunity to attend an exclusive concert experience this October. On 4 October 2015, eight musicians who are all members of the famous Berlin Philharmonic will play select pieces by Mozart and Schubert for an exceptional performance in Switzerland. Guests of The Chedi Andermatt can enjoy this offer alongside a three-course meal at The Restaurant the day before the concert, an eatery showcasing East-meets-West cuisine offering traditional Swiss, European and Asian cuisine with a contemporary twist. All this is topped off with an outstanding jazz performance by Live Bait in the hotel’s chic The Bar and Living Room, where signature cocktails, rustic bites, fine wines and local beers complement the live music. The Lucerne Festival in Andermatt package includes: • One night accommodation in a Deluxe Room or Deluxe Suite • Best seats in the house (one ticket per person) to see the Berlin Philharmonic Octet perform in the Parish Church of St. Peter and Paul in Andermatt • One three-course dinner at The Restaurant The small print: • One person in a Deluxe room from CHF 350 (approx. £238) per package, based on double occupancy • Additional nights possible for a special price • Valid only for arrivals on 3rd October 2015 • More information on this offer can be found at: http://www.ghmhotels.com/en/andermatt/packages-promotions/lucerne-festival-in-andermatt/ Related articles
